name: 3-Handed Laser Shuffle
description:
Control three lasers to break approaching blocks. Match the laser with the color of the block to destroy it. You'll soon wish you had three hands. For every 100 blocks destroyed, you get a freeze, which you can use with SPACE to stop from moving for five seconds. If you get too close to a block before destroying it, it's game over!

WASD - Move red laser

TFGH - Move green laser

Arrow keys - Move blue laser

SPACE - Freeze block movement for five seconds

This was created for the 2018 Mini Jam. To meet requirements, the game's resolution is 128x128, and it only has four colors.
